content: i wanted to make a bed for my cat the majority of the pet bed patterns i found are felted which i wasnt too keen on so i thought to myself self you can make your own pattern and i did i finished the first bed in one evening this is a very simple crochet pattern even the newest beginner should be able to make this quite easily this is also a fabulous stash buster it uses up to 1 250 yards of acrylic
